long_description: Penguin Sport-Wash is an environmentally friendly way to keep your high-tech fabrics odor-free and water repellent. Sport-Wash is readily biodegradable and contains no bleach, fabric softener, brightener or scent; rinses out completely without leaving residue. Will not interfere with wicking capabilities, breathability, water repellency or insulation; use on cotton, nylon, polyester and all synthetics. Restores factory-applied Durable Water Repellent finish. Removes odors, blood and grass stains, and prevents color fading. Contains six convenient, easy to use, individual 1 oz. packages-perfect for travelers.
short_description: Penguin Sport-Wash is an environmentally friendly way to keep your high-tech fabrics odor-free and water repellent.
